mapper.select:
SELECT sum(i.integral) as integral,u.name FROM user_integral i,`user` u
i.user_id = u.id
AND i.create_time > FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND i.create_time < FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY i.user_id ORDER BY i.create_time DESC

SELECT b.rownum FROM ( SELECT a.user_id,a.sums,@rownum := @rownum + 1 AS num_tmp,@incrnum := CASE WHEN @rowtotal = a.sums THEN @incrnum WHEN @rowtotal := a.sums THEN @rownum END AS rownum FROM ( SELECT *,SUM(integral) as sums FROM user_integral WHERE create_time > #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND create_time < #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP By user_id ORDER BY sums desc) AS a, (SELECT @rownum := 0 ,@rowtotal := NULL ,@incrnum := 0) r) AS b WHERE b.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into user_integral (id, task_id, user_id, integral, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
